channel.title: Climate Change in India: Read opinion articles and academic research from the experts on issues related to climate change | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Climate Change: Read opinion articles and in-depth analysis on issues related to climate change in India and environment policy on Hindustan Times. Know from the experts on various matters concerning environment like climate change, global warming, water, energy, pollution, plastics, natural resources, food security, clean cooking fuel, air quality, carbon footprints, urbanisation, agriculture, forests, natural disasters, floods, glacier bursts, forest fires, Himalayas and many more.
